actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of the outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) from $140 times the number of applicable months to $833.34 times the number of applicable months. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 403)

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of the outside earnings permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
